refs_library.title_en: Traditional Chinese medicine for the treatment of cancers of hepatobiliary system: from clinical evidence to drug discovery
refs_library.title_zh: 中医药治疗肝胆胰系统肿瘤：从临床证据到药物发现（综述）

refs_library.title_en: Unconventional Treatments for Pancreatic Cancer: A Systematic Review
refs_library.title_zh: 胰腺癌的非常规/补充疗法：系统综述

refs_library.title_en: Phage-based peptides for pancreatic cancer diagnosis and treatment: alternative approach
refs_library.title_zh: 噬菌体展示肽用于胰腺癌诊断与治疗：一种替代性思路

refs_library.title_en: Clinical Study of 32 Patients with Advanced Pancreatic Cancer Treated with TCM
refs_library.title_zh: 晚期胰腺癌32例中医药治疗临床观察（上传PDF）

items.name_zh: 中医辨证分型（示例：四型）
items.summary_zh: 部分资料将胰腺癌相关证候分为多种类型，用于指导治法与方药选择。
items.summary_en: Some sources describe multiple TCM patterns to guide treatment principles and formulas.

formula.zh: 大柴胡汤合血府逐瘀汤加减
formula.en: Da Chai Hu Tang + Xue Fu Zhu Yu Tang (modified)

notes.zh: 症状描述见来源；需注册中医师辨证。
notes.en: Symptoms are source-described; requires qualified TCM clinician.

risks.zh: 仅用于健康教育；不替代个体化诊疗。
risks.en: Educational only; not a substitute for individualized care.

items.name_zh: 肝胆湿热证（胰头癌伴黄疸）
items.summary_zh: 资料提到胰头癌伴黄疸、舌红苔黄腻等，可辨为肝胆湿热证，治以清肝利胆、祛湿降浊，方药茵陈蒿汤加减。
items.summary_en: Source describes jaundice presentation mapped to damp-heat; Yin Chen Hao Tang modifications suggested.

key_points.zh: 方药：茵陈蒿汤加减；药物包括茵陈、大黄、栀子等。
key_points.en: Formula: Yin Chen Hao Tang modified; herbs include Yin Chen, Da Huang, Zhi Zi.

risks.zh: 含大黄等泻下药，腹泻/肠梗阻风险者需谨慎并遵医嘱。
risks.en: Contains purgative herbs (e.g., Da Huang); caution with diarrhea/obstruction risks; clinician supervision needed.

items.name_zh: 中晚期常见：脾虚湿阻 / 肝阴亏虚
items.name_en: Common mid–late patterns: spleen deficiency with dampness / liver yin deficiency
items.summary_zh: 资料提到中晚期可见脾虚湿阻及肝阴亏虚证，分别可用陈夏六君汤加减与一贯煎合二至丸加减，并列出常用药材。
items.summary_en: Source notes these patterns and suggests Chenxia Liu Jun Tang or Yiguan Jian + Erzhi Wan modifications with example herbs.

key_points.zh: 脾虚湿阻：党参、白术、茯苓、法半夏等组成陈夏六君汤加减。
key_points.en: Spleen deficiency dampness: Chenxia Liu Jun Tang (e.g., Dang Shen, Bai Zhu, Fu Ling, Fa Ban Xia).

key_points.zh: 肝阴亏虚：一贯煎合二至丸加减；如沙参、麦冬、地黄、枸杞子、女贞子等。
key_points.en: Liver yin deficiency: Yiguan Jian + Erzhi Wan (e.g., Sha Shen, Mai Dong, Di Huang, Gou Qi Zi, Nv Zhen Zi).

key_points.zh: 常加用：半枝莲、蛇六谷、山慈菇、莪术等以清热解毒、活血消癥。
key_points.en: Often mentioned additions: Ban Zhi Lian, She Liu Gu, Shan Ci Gu, E Zhu, etc.

risks.zh: 化疗期间如需中药，应关注相互作用；可考虑以针灸等方式减轻不适，避免中药与化疗冲突。
risks.en: During chemotherapy, consider interaction risk; source suggests acupuncture for symptom relief to avoid herb–chemo conflict.

items.name_zh: 中药联合化疗/放疗：部分研究观察结果
items.name_en: Herbal medicine combined with chemo/radiotherapy: selected observational findings
items.summary_zh: 一篇综述/文献汇总提到，部分研究报道中药方联合化疗或放疗在疾病控制率/有效率、KPS等方面优于单纯治疗（具体方药与研究设计需逐条核对原文）。
items.summary_en: A review-style source reports some studies where herbal formulas plus chemo/radiotherapy showed higher response/control rates and better KPS; details require checking each original study.

key_points.zh: 示例：茵陈蒿汤联合替吉奥等；具体以原研究为准。
key_points.en: Example mentions Yin Chen Hao Tang with S-1; verify each original study.

risks.zh: 证据质量可能不一；需强调与主治团队沟通、避免延误标准治疗。
risks.en: Evidence quality varies; coordinate with oncology team and do not delay standard care.

items.name_zh: 中西医协作与风险管理（实践建议）
items.summary_zh: 来源提到在患者担忧化疗副作用时，可在化疗前以中药增体质，化疗期间优先用针灸等减少不适以避免“中药与化疗冲突”，化疗后再中药调理。
items.summary_en: Source suggests: use herbs pre-chemo for conditioning; prefer acupuncture during chemo to reduce side effects and avoid herb–chemo conflicts; resume herbs post-chemo.
key_points: 化疗前：条件允许可做支持性调理
化疗中：优先针灸/非药物支持，减少潜在相互作用
化疗后：再讨论中药调理

risks.zh: 任何中药/补充剂应记录并与肿瘤科/药师核对潜在相互作用。
risks.en: Record all herbs/supplements; cross-check interactions with oncology/pharmacy.

items.name_zh: 如何安全使用中医/整合医学信息
items.name_en: How to use integrative/TCM info safely
items.summary_zh: 中医/整合医学建议仅作为支持治疗信息，不可替代标准肿瘤治疗。
items.summary_en: Use TCM/integrative approaches as supportive care, not a replacement for standard oncology treatment.

key_points.zh: 任何中药/补充剂务必告知肿瘤团队。
key_points.en: Tell your oncology team about any herb/supplement you plan to use.

key_points.zh: 重点评估出血风险（抗凝、血小板低、手术前后）。
key_points.en: Check bleeding risk (anticoagulants, low platelets, surgery).

key_points.zh: 关注肝肾功能与药物代谢相互作用（如 CYP）。
key_points.en: Check liver/kidney function and potential CYP interactions.

key_points.zh: 优先选择合规执业者与质量可追溯产品。
key_points.en: Prefer licensed practitioners and products with quality control.

risks.zh: 仅供健康教育，不构成医疗建议。
risks.en: Educational only; not medical advice.

items.summary_zh: 支持治疗中部分非药物方法（如姜、针灸）有一定证据。
items.summary_en: Moderate evidence exists for some non-drug options (e.g., ginger, acupuncture) in supportive care.

key_points.zh: 记录诱因（高脂、辛辣、进食量）。
key_points.en: Track triggers (fat, spice, portion size).

key_points.zh: 若持续/严重或出现警讯需就医。
key_points.en: Escalate to clinician if persistent, severe, or with red flags.

risks.zh: 出现脱水、发热、便血或黄疸加重等需及时就医。
risks.en: Seek urgent care for dehydration, fever, blood in stool, or worsening jaundice.

items.summary_zh: 优先补液、低脂饮食；与医生讨论胰酶与感染等原因。
items.summary_en: Prioritize hydration, low-fat meals; discuss pancreatic enzymes and infections with clinician.

key_points.zh: 记录诱因（高脂、辛辣、进食量）。
key_points.en: Track triggers (fat, spice, portion size).

key_points.zh: 若持续/严重或出现警讯需就医。
key_points.en: Escalate to clinician if persistent, severe, or with red flags.

risks.zh: 出现脱水、发热、便血或黄疸加重等需及时就医。
risks.en: Seek urgent care for dehydration, fever, blood in stool, or worsening jaundice.

items.name_zh: 支持治疗：食欲差/体重下降
items.name_en: Supportive care: Poor appetite / weight loss
items.summary_zh: 营养支持（少量多餐+高蛋白）是核心；草药仅在医生知情下讨论。
items.summary_en: Nutrition support (high-protein, small frequent meals) is first-line; herbs may be discussed only with clinicians.

key_points.zh: 记录诱因（高脂、辛辣、进食量）。
key_points.en: Track triggers (fat, spice, portion size).

key_points.zh: 若持续/严重或出现警讯需就医。
key_points.en: Escalate to clinician if persistent, severe, or with red flags.

risks.zh: 出现脱水、发热、便血或黄疸加重等需及时就医。
risks.en: Seek urgent care for dehydration, fever, blood in stool, or worsening jaundice.

items.summary_zh: 镇痛以医学方案为主；可在适当时用身心疗法/针灸辅助舒缓。
items.summary_en: Medical pain control is primary; integrative options may support comfort (mind-body, acupuncture) where appropriate.

key_points.zh: 若疼痛升级或出现红旗症状（发热、黄疸加重等）需就医。
key_points.en: Seek medical review for escalation or red flags.

risks.zh: 出现脱水、发热、便血或黄疸加重等需及时就医。
risks.en: Seek urgent care for dehydration, fever, blood in stool, or worsening jaundice.

items.summary_zh: 常用于支持调理；证据质量不一。
items.summary_en: Commonly used in supportive care; evidence quality varies.

risks.zh: 免疫治疗期间需谨慎；关注肝功能。
risks.en: May interact with immune therapies; monitor liver enzymes.

risks.zh: 务必在医生知情下使用。
risks.en: Use only with clinician oversight.

items.summary_zh: 部分证据支持缓解恶心；耐受因人而异。
items.summary_en: Some evidence for nausea relief; individual tolerance varies.

risks.zh: 反酸/溃疡者可能刺激。
risks.en: Can irritate reflux/ulcer in sensitive people.

risks.zh: 大剂量补充剂与抗凝合用需谨慎。
risks.en: Be cautious with anticoagulants at high supplemental doses.

items.summary_zh: 方剂常见；高剂量可能有副作用。
items.summary_en: Often used in formulas; watch side effects with high intake.

risks.zh: 过量可能升血压/低钾。
risks.en: May raise blood pressure / lower potassium with excessive use.

risks.zh: 利尿剂/心血管用药者先咨询。
risks.en: Discuss if on diuretics or heart meds.

interactions.zh: 可能影响电解质，合并心律相关药物需谨慎。
interactions.en: Electrolyte effects; caution with rhythm-related drugs.

items.summary_zh: 部分场景对恶心/疼痛/焦虑有支持性证据。
items.summary_en: Supportive evidence exists for nausea/pain/anxiety in some settings.

risks.zh: 血小板低/抗凝者评估出血风险。
risks.en: Assess bleeding risk (low platelets/anticoagulants).

risks.zh: 选择正规机构与无菌操作。
risks.en: Use licensed practitioners & sterile technique.

items.summary_zh: 有助减压/睡眠/应对；相对安全。
items.summary_en: May help stress, sleep and coping; safe adjunct.

risks.zh: 不可替代医疗。
risks.en: Does not replace medical care.

risks.zh: 若加重焦虑不适则停止。
risks.en: Stop if it increases distress.

items.summary_zh: 常用于食欲差、腹胀、便溏等的讨论；需辨证个体化。
items.summary_en: Often discussed for appetite/bloating/loose stool patterns; must be individualized.

risks.zh: 可能存在药物相互作用（抗凝、化疗、免疫治疗）。
risks.en: Herb–drug interactions are possible (anticoagulants, chemo, immunotherapy).

items.summary_zh: 用于久泻乏力等讨论；需排除感染/梗阻。
items.summary_en: Discussed for chronic loose stools and fatigue patterns; rule out infection/obstruction.

risks.zh: 可能存在药物相互作用（抗凝、化疗、免疫治疗）。
risks.en: Herb–drug interactions are possible (anticoagulants, chemo, immunotherapy).

items.summary_zh: 涉及活血化瘀思路时需重点评估出血风险。
items.summary_en: When 'blood stasis' approach is considered, bleeding risk must be reviewed carefully.

risks.zh: 可能存在药物相互作用（抗凝、化疗、免疫治疗）。
risks.en: Herb–drug interactions are possible (anticoagulants, chemo, immunotherapy).

interactions.zh: 与抗凝/抗血小板合用需谨慎并监测。

items.summary_zh: 黄疸/湿热讨论较多；胆道梗阻需优先医学评估。
items.summary_en: Discussed in jaundice/damp-heat contexts; medical evaluation for biliary obstruction is critical.

risks.zh: 可能存在药物相互作用（抗凝、化疗、免疫治疗）。
risks.en: Herb–drug interactions are possible (anticoagulants, chemo, immunotherapy).

items.summary_zh: 若使用抗凝/血小板低/手术前后，涉及“活血化瘀”药材需医生评估后再考虑。
items.summary_en: If on anticoagulants, have low platelets, or around surgery, avoid 'blood-invigorating' herbs unless clinician approves.

risks.zh: 出现皮疹、肿胀、呼吸困难等需紧急就医。
risks.en: If you develop rash, swelling, breathing issues—seek emergency care.

items.summary_zh: 不少补充剂经肝肾代谢；建议监测化验，异常需停用并就医。
items.summary_en: Many supplements are metabolized by liver/kidney. Monitor labs and stop if abnormalities occur.

risks.zh: 出现皮疹、肿胀、呼吸困难等需紧急就医。
risks.en: If you develop rash, swelling, breathing issues—seek emergency care.

items.summary_zh: 优先第三方检测产品；警惕重金属/掺假。
items.summary_en: Prefer products with third-party testing; beware heavy metals and adulteration.

risks.zh: 出现皮疹、肿胀、呼吸困难等需紧急就医。
risks.en: If you develop rash, swelling, breathing issues—seek emergency care.

items.summary_zh: 一些“健康产品”含糖醇，可能加重腹泻/胀气。
items.summary_en: Some 'health' products contain sugar alcohols that worsen diarrhea/bloating.

risks.zh: 出现皮疹、肿胀、呼吸困难等需紧急就医。
risks.en: If you develop rash, swelling, breathing issues—seek emergency care.

items.name_zh: 关于补充剂/中药，应该问医生什么？
items.name_en: Questions to ask your clinician about supplements
items.summary_zh: 用这些问题降低使用补充剂/中药的风险。
items.summary_en: Use these questions to reduce risk when considering supplements/herbs.

key_points.zh: 与我目前化疗/免疫治疗方案是否安全？
key_points.en: Is it safe with my chemo/immunotherapy regimen?

key_points.zh: 与我的用药/化验是否有出血风险？
key_points.en: Any bleeding risk with my meds or labs?

key_points.zh: 如何监测肝肾功能？
key_points.en: How to monitor liver/kidney function?

key_points.zh: 哪些产品/品牌有质量检测？
key_points.en: Which products/brands have quality testing?

risks.zh: 不要一次同时新增多个产品。
risks.en: Do not start multiple new products at once.

items.summary_zh: 综述中作为临床研究中出现的中医药制剂之一。临床证据与适应证需以具体试验为准；潜在心律/电解质相关风险需评估，建议仅在医疗监管下使用。
items.summary_en: Listed among TCM therapeutics appearing in clinical trials. Indications and benefit/risk should follow specific trials; potential cardiac/electrolyte risks warrant medical supervision.

risks.zh: 潜在心脏相关不良反应风险；禁用于来源不明制剂
risks.en: Potential cardiac adverse-event risk; avoid unknown products.

interactions.zh: 与影响心律或电解质的药物合用需谨慎
interactions.en: Use caution with drugs affecting rhythm or electrolytes.

items.name_zh: 依卡替尼（Icaritin，天然产物衍生物）
items.summary_zh: 综述提及其在肝胆胰系统肿瘤的临床研究与药物发现价值。对胰腺癌的临床证据需以具体试验为准；作为药物/成分应关注药代与肝功能监测。
items.summary_en: Review highlights clinical evidence and drug-discovery potential in hepatobiliary system cancers. Pancreatic-cancer-specific clinical evidence depends on individual trials; monitor pharmacokinetics and liver function.
use_cases: 药物发现/临床研究条目

risks.zh: 作为药物级干预需遵循试验/处方规范
risks.en: Drug-level intervention should follow trial/prescription protocol.

interactions.zh: 可能与肝酶代谢相关药物相互作用，需监测

items.summary_zh: 作为补充/草本使用较常见，研究多聚焦疲劳、食欲与生活质量等支持性结局；证据质量不一。化疗/免疫治疗期间使用需评估相互作用与血糖、血压影响。
items.summary_en: Commonly used supplement; studies focus on supportive outcomes (fatigue, appetite, QoL) with variable quality. During chemo/immunotherapy, assess interactions and effects on glucose/blood pressure.

risks.zh: 可能影响血糖/血压；来源与剂量不确定风险
risks.en: May affect glucose/blood pressure; risk from uncertain source/dosing.

interactions.zh: 可能影响免疫调节或CYP代谢通路；用药清单需共享
interactions.en: Possible immune/CYP pathway effects; share full supplement list with oncology team.

items.summary_zh: 多为机制与前临床研究；胰腺癌临床证据有限。作为补充剂高剂量可能增加出血风险或加重胃肠道不适；化疗期不建议自行大剂量使用。
items.summary_en: Mostly mechanistic and preclinical evidence; limited clinical data in pancreatic cancer. High-dose supplementation may increase bleeding risk or GI upset; avoid self-prescribed high doses during chemo.

risks.zh: 出血风险、胃刺激
risks.en: Bleeding risk; GI irritation.

interactions.zh: 与抗凝/抗血小板药物合用需谨慎

items.name_zh: 噬菌体展示肽靶向策略（研究进展，非TCM）
items.summary_zh: 综述介绍噬菌体展示技术筛选高亲和力肽用于胰腺癌早期检测、靶向递送与治疗的研究进展。属于实验与转化研究方向，不属于中医药治疗；可作为“替代/创新策略”证据条目补充展示。
items.summary_en: Review describes phage display to identify high-affinity peptides for early detection, targeted delivery and treatment in pancreatic cancer. This is translational research (non-TCM) and included here as an innovation/alternative strategy reference.

risks.zh: 目前主要为研究阶段，临床可及性有限
risks.en: Primarily research-stage; limited clinical availability.

interactions.zh: 与临床治疗方案需由肿瘤团队评估
interactions.en: Integration with care should be assessed by oncology team.

items.name_zh: 中医药联合化疗（整合肿瘤支持治疗）
items.name_en: TCM as an adjunct to chemotherapy (integrative oncology supportive care)
items.summary_zh: 系统综述与部分临床研究提示：在规范化肿瘤治疗基础上，部分中医药干预作为辅助治疗可能改善生活质量（QoL/KPS）并减轻化疗相关不良反应；证据质量与干预类型差异较大，需在肿瘤团队知情与监测下使用。
items.summary_en: Reviews and some clinical studies suggest certain TCM interventions, when used alongside standard oncology care, may improve QoL/KPS and reduce chemotherapy-related adverse effects; evidence quality varies by intervention and requires oncology-team oversight.
key_points: 以“支持治疗/整合医学”定位：不替代标准治疗
优先选择有质量控制与临床证据的制剂/干预（并记录具体成分与剂量）
目标更偏向：QoL、食欲、疲劳、化疗相关毒副反应管理
use_cases: 化疗毒性管理（在监测下）
risks: 不可替代标准治疗；避免自行停用/延迟化疗
制剂来源与质量控制差异大（尤其注射剂/复方）
肝肾功能异常、黄疸、感染或血小板低下时需谨慎/暂停并先就医
interactions: 可能影响肝药酶/凝血（与抗凝/抗血小板药并用需监测）
免疫治疗期间需谨慎（潜在免疫调节作用）

items.name_zh: 化疗合并中医药：安全性核对清单
items.name_en: Safety checklist for combining TCM with chemotherapy
items.summary_zh: 给临床沟通用的安全核对要点：明确所用中药/成分/剂型；评估出血风险、肝肾功能、感染风险；记录所有补充剂与草药；出现黄疸加重、持续腹泻/呕吐、发热或出血倾向时需立即就医并暂停补充疗法。
items.summary_en: A practical safety checklist for clinical communication when combining TCM/supplements with chemotherapy.
key_points: 每次化疗前复核：草药/补充剂清单（名称、剂型、剂量、品牌）
监测：肝肾功能、凝血/血小板、白细胞/感染风险
出现严重不良反应（发热、出血、黄疸加重、脱水）立即停用并就医
risks: 潜在药物相互作用（CYP/凝血/免疫）
部分草药/补充剂存在肝毒性或肾毒性风险
未经标准化的制剂可能导致成分与剂量不明
interactions: 抗凝/抗血小板药：出血风险
免疫治疗：潜在免疫调节影响
糖皮质激素/止吐药等：可能有叠加影响（需医生评估）
